column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''34''' is the thirty-fourth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Morgoth's Ring: A Linguistic Review — Part I" — Patrick Wynne and Carl F. Hostetter.
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
